commands.name: config get
commands.description: Get the value of a configuration variable.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --verbose
optionalFlags.description: Display whether the configuration variables are set locally or globally.

commands.name: config list
commands.description: List the configuration variables that you've previously set.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

commands.name: config set
commands.description: Set one or more configuration variables, such as your default org.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --global
optionalFlags.description: Set the configuration variables globally, so they can be used from any Salesforce DX project.

commands.name: config unset
commands.description: Unset local or global configuration variables.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.
